mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alphafrog_strategy_definition (portfolio_id, user_id, name, description, rule_json, rebalance_rule, capital_base, start_date, end_date, status, ext) VALUES (#{portfolioId}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, CAST(#{ruleJson} AS jsonb), #{rebalanceRule}, #{capitalBase}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, CAST(#{extJson} AS jsonb))
mapper.select: SELECT id, portfolio_id, user_id, name, description, rule_json::text AS rule_json, rebalance_rule, capital_base, start_date, end_date, status, created_at, updated_at, ext::text AS ext_json FROM alphafrog_strategy_definition WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND status != 'archived' LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE alphafrog_strategy_definition SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, rule_json = CAST(#{ruleJson} AS jsonb), rebalance_rule = #{rebalanceRule}, capital_base = #{capitalBase}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, status = #{status}, ext = CAST(#{extJson} AS jsonb), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
